text: Richard Bruce Hunter (July 6, 1939 - July 6, 2018) was an American competition swimmer. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. He represented the United States at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome.Sports-Reference.com, Olympic Sports, Athletes, Bruce Hunter . Retrieved January 27, 2013. Hunter swam in the men's 100-meter freestyle, advanced to the finals, and finished fourth overall with a time of 55.6 seconds.Sports-Reference.com, Olympic Sports, Swimming at the 1960 Roma Summer Games, Men's 100 metres Freestyle Final . Retrieved January 27, 2013. ==Death== Hunter died on his 79th birthday on July 6, 2018 in Boston.Bruce Hunter's obituary ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American swimmers Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Boston
title: Bruce Hunter (swimmer)
